text: ~MvyAca#ShTEq bRuhaqspati#stvA suqmnE ra#NvaqtvityA#haq brahmaq vai dEqvAnAqM bRuhaqspatiq-rbrahma#NaiqvAsmai# paqSUnava# rundhE ruqdrO vasu#BiqrA ci#kEqtvityAqhA&&*vRu#ttyai pRuthiqvyAstvA# mUqd^^rdhannA ji#Garmi dEvaqyaja#naq ityA#ha pRuthiqvyA hyE#Sha mUqd^^rdhA yad-dE#vaqyaja#naqmiDA#yAH paqda ityAqhEDA#yaiq hyE#tat paqdaM ~Myath sO#maqkraya#Nyai GRuqtava#tiq svAhE - [  ] 55
